story.storykicker: The XIC OET results 2016 have been declared on the official website.
story.storybody:
The Xavier Institute of Communications has declared the results for the Online Entrance Test (OET) on its official website.

The candidates who appeared for the entrance examination can check their scores on the official website.

The candidates should perform the following steps to check the XIC OET 2016 results:

  • Log on to the official website, the link for which is http://www.xaviercomm.org/
  • Click on the live link 'Entrance Test Results 2016-17'
  • Then according to the course applied for click on the name of the courses, for instance a candidate who appeared in the entrance examination for Journalism should click on the link 'Journalism and Mass Communication'
  • The list of the short listed candidates will appear on the screen
For the various programmes namely Journalism and Mass Communication, Advertising and Marketing Communication, Mass Communication Marathi, Communication for Development as well as Film, TV and Digital Video, the names of the candidates along with their reference numbers have been posted on the official website.

 

To help the candidates, various important instructions regarding admission have also been published on the website.

Regarding PR and Corporate Communication course, the list of shortlisted candidates has been released on the website. Those who have been shortlisted need to appear for a group discussion (GD) on a specified time, mentioned against their names.

The aspirants, who have successfully cleared the GD round can get an admission in the course.

The GD round for the admissions in Public Relations and Corporate Communication is scheduled to be held on June 6, June 8 and June 10, 2016.

For more updates, follow India Today Education.
